Text.Page:
The good news is we found all those missing weapons...the ones we thought were lost in transit when we got here.

The bad news is we found them in crates that the pirates were transporting.

And they've got more! We've got to get those weapons back before the pirates use them to spill Valkyon blood!
Lesson learned: Just because you're out in the jungle doesn't mean you don't have to worry about pilfering, petty theft, and worse.

You want the pirates to equip themselves with our weapons before they start stabbing us?

Do you have the concept of "poetic justice" completely reversed in your mind?
